item.title: Mad about Scandinavia
item.author: Rickard Calel,Wei Kheng,
item.description: Getting tired and sick of the same old fast food? Here’s a change for your taste buds going into the toughest second term of your life. Madsen, the Scandinavian restaurant located in the heart of South Kensington answers all foodie-related questions about our Northern neighbour’s cuisine. With …
